Industries We Serve

Smarter, Faster, More Efficient Businesses Powered by OKS

At OKS, we help organizations across different industries modernize their operations using a powerful combination of Odoo ERP implementation, custom software & app development, and AI automation & intelligent workflows.

Every industry has unique challenges. We design digital solutions that directly solve them.

Restaurants, Bars & Hospitality

Transform your entire guest experience and operations.

Pain Points

  • •Slow order processing
  • •Manual stock tracking
  • •Staff management challenges
  • •Poor customer follow-up
  • •High operational costs

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Odoo POS for fast order handling
  • ✓Automated stock deduction & purchase alerts
  • ✓Kitchen order display systems
  • ✓WhatsApp table reservation bot
  • ✓AI daily sales reporting

Outcome:

Faster service, reduced waste, fewer errors, happier customers.

Retail & Supermarkets

From shelves to checkout—everything synchronized and optimized.

Pain Points

  • •Stockouts & overstocking
  • •Slow checkout systems
  • •Manual supplier management
  • •Lack of visibility across branches

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Real-time inventory tracking
  • ✓Automated reordering
  • ✓Multi-branch management
  • ✓POS with barcode scanning
  • ✓AI-driven sales forecasting & Customer loyalty automation

Outcome:

Higher sales, better customer experience, fewer losses.

Logistics, Delivery & Transport

End-to-end automation for smooth movement of goods and people.

Pain Points

  • •Manual dispatching
  • •Difficulty tracking deliveries
  • •Poor communication with customers
  • •Paper-based documentation

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Fleet management systems
  • ✓Real-time vehicle tracking dashboards
  • ✓Automated delivery notifications
  • ✓Driver mobile apps & Electronic proof of delivery (ePOD)
  • ✓AI route optimization & Odoo integration for billing & accounting

Outcome:

Fast dispatching, accurate tracking, improved customer trust.

Clinics, Pharmacies & Healthcare

Digital tools built to improve care and streamline operations.

Pain Points

  • •Paper records
  • •Slow patient processing
  • •Stock management for drugs
  • •Lack of automated reminders

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Patient management portals
  • ✓Pharmacy inventory automation
  • ✓Appointment scheduling bots
  • ✓AI medical record search & Automated follow-up SMS
  • ✓Odoo for billing, accounting & insurance

Outcome:

Smoother workflows and better patient experience.

Schools, Colleges & Training Centers

Education management made simple and efficient.

Pain Points

  • •Manual admission processes
  • •Fee tracking issues
  • •Poor communication with parents
  • •Unorganized academic records

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Student information systems
  • ✓Timetable & exam management
  • ✓Online parent portal + mobile app
  • ✓AI attendance & performance reporting
  • ✓Automated fee reminders & receipts

Outcome:

More organization, transparency, and better administration.

Manufacturing & Production

Automate processes and track production end-to-end.

Pain Points

  • •Manual production tracking
  • •Unclear cost structures
  • •Raw material waste
  • •Delayed reporting

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Manufacturing resource planning (MRP)
  • ✓Bill of materials automation
  • ✓Work order tracking
  • ✓Machine maintenance reminders & Quality checks with AI vision tools
  • ✓Real-time dashboards & Supply chain automation with Odoo

Outcome:

Better efficiency, fewer delays, and lower production costs.

Professional Services

Agencies, Law Firms & Consultants—Digital systems that enhance client management and internal efficiency.

Pain Points

  • •Manual task management
  • •Time-consuming reporting
  • •Poor document organization
  • •Billing inconsistencies

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Client project portals
  • ✓Automated billing & time tracking
  • ✓Proposal generators
  • ✓AI document search & classification
  • ✓Workflow automation & CRM + invoicing through Odoo

Outcome:

More productivity, better client experience, and predictable revenue.

Financial Services, SACCOs & Microfinance

Secure automation for money movement and customer engagement.

Pain Points

  • •Manual records
  • •Long queues / slow service
  • •Loan tracking errors
  • •Compliance challenges

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Loan management portals
  • ✓Member mobile apps
  • ✓Automated reminders
  • ✓Secure AI document scanning
  • ✓Real-time financial dashboards & Odoo for accounting & reconciliation

Outcome:

Faster processing, fewer errors, and stronger compliance.

Real Estate & Property Management

Smarter tools for property, tenant, and payment management.

Pain Points

  • •Manual rent collection
  • •Poor lease management
  • •Hard-to-track maintenance
  • •Poor communication

How OKS Helps

  • ✓Tenant portals
  • ✓Automated rent reminders
  • ✓Maintenance ticketing systems
  • ✓AI document management
  • ✓Odoo for payments & invoicing

Outcome:

Smooth operations and improved tenant satisfaction.
